author: Nahal Toosi
title: Biden ad exposes a rift over China on the left
description: The former vice president's effort to hit Trump as soft on Beijing is backfiring among parts of his base.
content: The criticism on the left emerged after the Biden team released a digital ad that ripped the president as too willing to accept Chinese government explanations in the early days of the virus. Trump rolled over for the Chinese, the ad says, while Biden takes a… [+4903 chars]
